titleStmt.title: An account of the growth of popery and arbitrary government in England more particularly, from the long prorogation of November, 1675, ending the 15th of February, 1676, till the last meeting of Parliament, the 16th of July, 1677.
titleStmt.author: Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to A. Marvell. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
